name: Jen Jeng
currentTitle: Innovation Partner | Working with SMEs and organisations to design human-centred, future-ready growth in an AI-powered World
targetTitles: Head of Innovation and Venture Design
elevatorPitch: I'm an experienced business strategist and innovation management consultant with over 20 years of experience in agencies, consultancies, and in-house enterprise companies. I worked with ambitious change leaders and founders across a wide range of sectors—large FMCG, media, telecoms, retail, government, to University and scaling startups.
careerNarrative: I blend a human-centred and structured approach (enhanced by AI tools) to unlock growth by defining, designing and launching products, services and ventures. My work ranges from facilitating strategy workshops to align teams, delivering design sprints to expedite processes, to developing business models and experiments to validate ideas and product-market fit and innovation processes to solving complex problems and to delivering transformation.
lookingFor: Setting up innovation and venture functions
